name: The ancient amulet of Tythus
data: It increases the users constitution unbelievably much.
It decreases the users wisdom slightly.
It decreases the users intelligence slightly.
It has pathetic armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It decreases the users spellpoint regeneration poorly.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'system shock'.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It gives small bonus to the skill 'ignore pain'.
Tythus's amulet is rumored to provide its user with legendary health.
